content.p: The University of Nottingham has, throughout its history, been at the forefront of internationalisation in higher education. The Knowledge Without Borders Network builds on these initiatives, confirming our status as pioneers and leaders in global higher education. At the University of Nottingham: The University of Nottingham Internationalisation Strategy telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8040 email: kwbn@nottingham.edu.my
